publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.l: Since the time I young, I always thought about speed,
So I took out my toy car, and I drove out to the highway.
In the moment I got there,
all the drivers stopped and stare in respect,
I can still remember that my parents were about to collapse.
I'm a king of the road.
I am riding, I am riding -where you riding to?
When I came to the age I could register my license,
I could see on the faces of my parents panic rising.
All the shield and iron that they put on the car couldn't help,
I put my hands on the wheel - and then
I'm a king of the road.
I am riding, I am riding -where you riding to
